contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Roullours |image = FranceNormandieRoulloursEglise.jpg |caption = Saint Martin |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Vire |canton = Vire |INSEE = 14545 |postal code = 14500 |mayor = Nicole Desmottes |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Vire |longitude = -0.8386 |latitude = 48.8333 |elevation m = 312 |elevation min m = 169 |elevation max m = 308 |area km2 = 13.15 |population = 859 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Roullours}} '''Roullours''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|545 |1968|502 |1975|520 |1982|555 |1990|674 |1999|769 |2008|859 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
